snippet: The emotions of fear and anger have long motivated consumers and investors. So why can’t everyone become rich?
abstract: John Schwartz humorous essay on emotions of fear and anger that have long motivated consumers and investors; wonders why more people are unable to harness those emotions to improve their finances and become rich in the stock market.
lead_paragraph: The emotions of fear and anger have long motivated consumers and investors. So why can’t everyone become rich?

headline.main: Here Come the Zombies, but Not the Cash
headline.print_headline: Here Come The Zombies, But Not the Cash
